title: "omg, your birthday is on christmas! that's so awesome!"
body:
No, it blows. I only ever had 1 day to expect gifts, while everyone else has 2 days. The 2x gifts in 1 day is a myth. It's hard to get people to celebrate with you, because it's Christmas, and people are doing Christmas things. 

On that note, i'll be 24 tomorrow. Make me feel PRETTY.
